TopicTitle: Can you add new parts and ships while the game is running?

Articles.Content: I haven't tried it yet because I'm worried about crashing the program or the computer. I'm asking this because it takes so long to start the game that I would rather avoid restarting it when I find a new download on the forum.
Well, whats the worst thing that can happen? Just back your game up ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> I haven't tried it yet because I'm worried about crashing the program or the computer. I'm asking this because it takes so long to start the game that I would rather avoid restarting it when I find a new download on the forum.

You will need to restart the program to load new parts.

You should only load the mods you're going to be using. If you download a part or pack and don't find any to your liking, you should delete them to speed up loading.

Cheers!
